name: Tamám Shud
description:
Explore a barren world as its sole survivor, and find a way to end it at last.

Press right to progress and left to observe.

A short narrative game originally created for the 34th Ludum Dare 48 hour game competition. The theme was a tie between "Two Button Controls" and "Growing". This post-compo version includes a revised script and some other minor improvements.
